title: Email Validator Web Application
description: Built a responsive web app to validate email input in real time. Utilized JavaScript regex for dynamic input validation. Designed a clean, mobile-friendly user interface using HTML and CSS.

title: Hotel Management System
description: Developed a full-stack Hotel Management System using Streamlit and SQLite. Implemented user authentication and managed hotels, rooms, guests, reservations, and staff operations. Designed a role-based UI for streamlined staff operations. Secured authentication using password hashing and input validation. Maintained a relational database structure with foreign key constraints.

title: Password Manager Web App
description: Created a secure password manager with full-stack technologies. Integrated user authentication and implemented password encryption. Developed a responsive and accessible UI using ReactJS. Followed RESTful API best practices to ensure scalable backend services.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and built a personal portfolio to showcase projects, skills, and experience. Created a fully responsive UI using ReactJS and CSS modules. Deployed the application and followed component-based design patterns.
